title: The Move
description: As if being seventeen isn’t hard enough already, Lisa’s life is flipped upside down when her father gets a promotion at work and the entire family has to move out-of-state. She has to leave the only home she has ever known, all of her friends, and worst of all, her boyfriend that she has been with for most of her high school life. When faced with the challenges of a long-distance relationship will they have what it takes to make it work, or will it all fall apart?
author: Christopher McGoldrick
